title: Johannis Tarnovii S.S. Th. D. & in Academia Rostochiensi Professoris In Prophetam Malachiam Commentarius
creator: Tarnow, Johann
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Tarnow, Johann: Johannis Tarnovii S.S. Th. D. & in Academia Rostochiensi Professoris In Prophetam Malachiam Commentarius  in quo textus analysi perspicua illustratur, ex fonte hebraeo explicatur, locis S.S. parallēlois confirmatur, a pravis expositionibus vindicatur, Usus vero in Locis Communibus ex ipsa Scriptura natis & probatis indicatur. Rostochi[i]  Berlin 1644
